metas.title: Insights | Self-sovereign and decentralized identity intelligence
metas.description: Practical insights on the transformation of digital identity

introSection.title: INSIGHTS
introSection.description: Gataca has built three components to connect the secure digital ID ecosystem. We help issuers transform their CREDENTIALS into IDENTITY wallets in customers' mobile phones that they can then CONNECT to digital services, from e-government through to car sharing.
